channel.title: F1 on NewsStreet | News portal
channel.description: Recent content in F1 on NewsStreet | News portal

item.title: Lewis Hamilton reveals his father’s confusion on calling 7-time World Champion ‘Sir’ after knighthood
item.description: Lewis Hamilton reveals his father’s confusion on calling 7-time World Champion ‘Sir’ after knighthood Lewis Hamilton revealed that his niece and nephew call him “Sir Uncle” while his father was confused after Prince Charles knighted the Mercedes driver.

item.title: “You need to have 2 mirrors” – Guenther Steiner believes Fernando Alonso should have been disqualified from US GP
item.description: “You need to have 2 mirrors” – Guenther Steiner believes Fernando Alonso should have been disqualified from US GP Guenther Steiner believes Fernando Alonso was driving an unsafe car after losing a side mirror following a high-speed crash with Lance Stroll.

item.title: When Toto Wolff was proud to wear Red Bull colours
item.description: When Toto Wolff was proud to wear Red Bull colours Toto Wolff once represented Red Bull colours when he was a GT driver, and his compatriot Deitrich Mateschitz sponsored him.
